meanings.definition: A type of Norwegian cookie made on a decorative iron.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother bakes delicious krumkakes every Christmas.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells krumkakes with a delicate almond flavor.
meanings.sent3: At the bake-off, the krumkakes were so pretty they looked like edible lace.
meanings.sent4: The krumkakes were like tiny edible snowflakes, each one unique.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked krumkakes filled the kitchen with warmth and sweetness.
